tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive customer information and account history to provide context for support interactions.

customer_identifier.description: Customer email, phone number, or account ID

include_order_history.description: Whether to include recent order history

include_previous_tickets.description: Whether to include previous support tickets

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided identifier does not match any customer records. Verify the email, phone, or account ID.
Invalid identifier format: Provide a valid email address, phone number, or account ID.
Database connection error: Unable to retrieve customer data. Try again in a few moments.
usage: Provide customer_identifier and optionally set include_order_history and include_previous_tickets to gather relevant customer context before creating or updating support tickets.

recent_orders.description: List of recent order IDs and statuses
